text: Located over at the waterfront mall, Northshore Plaza II, this pirate ship-themed playground has lots to offer to kids for a great time of play! The entire play structure is designed just like a ship, with two decks coupled with plenty of fun and exciting play equipment!

Pirate themed playground - NEW & CLEAN!
Lots of activities to do.

🔥 Pro tip: grabbed some coffee and sit in the bench while looking out to your kids playing.

Follow us in Instagram and Tiktok for more Singapore play idea
@mommychriszy

Use “ 𝐂𝐇𝐑𝐈𝐒𝐙𝐘𝟓𝐎𝐅𝐅 “ for 5% discount on KLOOK. 🧡
A cool pirate ship concept playground. Best for children above 5 years old. Can be packed with kids during evening weekday and weekends.

There was no one there when I visited, I thought it was still closed but I think because it was raining earlier and it was a little bit wet that no one played. Seems fun for kids to play at the ship. Will bring my kids to play next time coming to Northshore Plaza II again.
A playground designed like a ship, there are loads of play features that will entertain the kids, be it if they will like to climb or just play with musical instruments.
